verses.text: Ephraim feedeth \w on|strong="H1004"\w* wind, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* followeth \w after|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* east wind: \w he|strong="H1004"\w* continually multiplieth \w lies|strong="H3585"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* desolation; \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5437"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Assyria, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* oil \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w carried|strong="H5437"\w* \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Egypt.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H7307"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* controversy \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Judah, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* punish Jacob according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ways; according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* doings \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* recompense \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heel; \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* manhood \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* power \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*:
yea, he had \w power|strong="H8280"\w* over the angel, and prevailed; he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him at Beth-el, and there he spake \w with|strong="H8280"\w* us,

even \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* hosts; \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H4672"\w* memorial \add name\add*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* turn thou \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: keep kindness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wait \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H3068"\w*.

\add He is\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trafficker, \w the|strong="H8104"\w* balances \w of|strong="H4941"\w* deceit \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* hand: \w he|strong="H7725"\w* loveth \w to|strong="H7725"\w* oppress.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Ephraim said, Surely \w I|strong="H3027"\w* am \w become|strong="H3027"\w* rich, \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* found \w me|strong="H3027"\w* wealth: \w in|strong="H3027"\w* all \w my|strong="H3027"\w* labors \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* find \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3027"\w* no iniquity \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* sin.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H4672"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* again make \w thee|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H4672"\w* tents, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* solemn feast.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* spoken \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* multiplied visions; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ministry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* used similitudes.

\w Is|strong="H3027"\w* Gilead iniquity? \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* altogether false; \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Gilgal \w they|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice bullocks; yea, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H1696"\w* heaps \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furrows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Jacob fled \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Aram, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* Israel \w served|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* \add sheep\add*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* up out \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w*.

Ephraim \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* provoked \w to|strong="H3478"\w* anger \w most|strong="H3068"\w* bitterly: \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* blood \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* reproach \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* return \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*.
